game.name: Miraculous Ladybug First Aid
game.description:
One of the most popular flash games to play for girls, Miraculous Ladybug First Aid is a highly challenging and addictive doctor game. Ladybug has got an accident. Her friend ?Super Cat? spots her and takes her to the hospital. The first and most important thing at this time is to give her first aid. In this cool free online game, your task is to protect Ladybug along with her friend. You can not take any risk.  Analyze the situation immediately and follow the most appropriate procedures in order to cure her and help her to come back to the normal life. 

Miraculous Ladybug First Aid is game filled with many unexpected challenges and obstacles. Although her friend has rescued her, all his efforts might go in vain if you can not help him to find out the first aid box and give this beautiful girl a proper and effective treatment. Following the proper guidelines with an open mind is a trick to finishing your job successfully.

One of the hugely popular free online kids game, Miraculous Ladybug First Aid can be played conveniently on desktops, smartphones or tablets. Play this game safely and help Cat to save her friend ? Ladybug. The proper utilization of first aid box will help you to improve your medial skills and learn how to react if something like this happens in your real life. You can use your mouse to play this cool doctor game for girls.
